snippet.title: GLUF Walkthrough, ZX Spectrum
snippet.description:
A walkthrough of the 2019 ZX Spectrum game, GLUF. Activate all the circuits on the floor on each level by jumping on them. Each circuit activated reduces your power, so you need to recharge yourself when required by jumping on a battery. Download this game here: http://www.retrosouls.net/

From the recording originally sent by Pavel Plíva to http://www.rzxarchive.co.uk/ . Recorded using "rollback", a feature of the emulator which allows you to mark a point, which you can then roll back to later if you get into difficulty, and try again. More info. on the channel "About" page: https://www.youtube.com/user/rzxarchive/about

#ZXSpectrum #RetroGaming #Walkthrough
